title: GitHub Agentic Workflows Agent Output
description: Schema for the agent output file generated by the collect_output step in GitHub Agentic Workflows. This file contains the validated output from AI agents, structured as SafeOutput items with any validation errors. The actual business logic validation (such as ensuring update-issue has at least one updateable field) is handled by the JavaScript validation code.

items.description: Array of validated safe output items

errors.description: Array of validation errors encountered during processing

SafeOutput.title: Safe Output Item
SafeOutput.description: Union type of all supported safe output entries

CreateIssueOutput.title: Create Issue Output
CreateIssueOutput.description: Output for creating a GitHub issue

title.description: Title of the issue to create

labels.description: Optional labels to add to the issue

AddCommentOutput.title: Add Issue Comment Output
AddCommentOutput.description: Output for adding a comment to an issue or pull request

CreatePullRequestOutput.title: Create Pull Request Output
CreatePullRequestOutput.description: Output for creating a GitHub pull request

body.description: Body content of the pull request

branch.description: Optional branch name for the pull request

labels.description: Optional labels to add to the pull request

AddLabelsOutput.title: Add Issue Label Output
AddLabelsOutput.description: Output for adding labels to an issue or pull request

labels.description: Array of label names to add

AddReviewerOutput.title: Add Reviewer Output
AddReviewerOutput.description: Output for adding reviewers to a pull request

reviewers.description: Array of GitHub usernames to add as reviewers

pull_request_number.description: Pull request number (optional - uses triggering PR if not provided)

UpdateIssueOutput.title: Update Issue Output
UpdateIssueOutput.description: Output for updating an existing issue. Note: The JavaScript validation ensures at least one of status, title, or body is provided.

body.description: New body content for the issue

UpdatePullRequestOutput.title: Update Pull Request Output
UpdatePullRequestOutput.description: Output for updating an existing pull request's title and/or body. Note: The JavaScript validation ensures at least one of title or body is provided.

title.description: New title for the pull request

body.description: New body content for the pull request

pull_request_number.description: Pull request number to update (for target '*')

PushToPullRequestBranchOutput.title: Push to Branch Output
PushToPullRequestBranchOutput.description: Output for pushing changes directly to a branch

CreatePullRequestReviewCommentOutput.title: Create Pull Request Review Comment Output
CreatePullRequestReviewCommentOutput.description: Output for creating a review comment on a specific line of code

start_line.description: Optional start line for multi-line comments

side.description: Side of the diff to comment on

CreateDiscussionOutput.title: Create Discussion Output
CreateDiscussionOutput.description: Output for creating a GitHub discussion

CloseDiscussionOutput.title: Close Discussion Output
CloseDiscussionOutput.description: Output for closing a GitHub discussion with an optional comment and resolution reason

body.description: Comment body to add when closing the discussion

discussion_number.description: Discussion number to close (optional - uses triggering discussion if not provided)

CloseIssueOutput.title: Close Issue Output
CloseIssueOutput.description: Output for closing a GitHub issue with a comment

body.description: Comment body to add when closing the issue

issue_number.description: Issue number to close (optional - uses triggering issue if not provided)

ClosePullRequestOutput.title: Close Pull Request Output
ClosePullRequestOutput.description: Output for closing a GitHub pull request without merging, with a comment

body.description: Comment body to add when closing the pull request

pull_request_number.description: Pull request number to close (optional - uses triggering PR if not provided)

MissingToolOutput.title: Missing Tool Output
MissingToolOutput.description: Output for reporting missing tools or functionality

reason.description: Reason why the tool is needed

CreateCodeScanningAlertOutput.title: Create Code Scanning Alert Output
CreateCodeScanningAlertOutput.description: Output for generating SARIF repository security advisories

sarif.description: SARIF content as object or string

category.description: Optional category for the code scanning alert

UpdateProjectOutput.title: Update Project Output
UpdateProjectOutput.description: Output for unified project operations: create projects, add items (issues/PRs/drafts), and update item fields

project.description: Project title, number, or GitHub project URL

campaign_id.description: Optional campaign ID for tracking (auto-generated if not provided). Format: slug-timestamp

content_type.description: Type of content to add to the project board

issue.description: Issue number (legacy field, use content_number instead)

pull_request.description: PR number (legacy field, use content_number instead)

fields.description: Custom project field values to set/update. Creates fields if missing.

UpdateReleaseOutput.title: Update Release Output
UpdateReleaseOutput.description: Output for updating a GitHub release description

tag.description: Tag name of the release to update

body.description: Content to set or append to the release body

AssignMilestoneOutput.title: Assign Milestone Output
AssignMilestoneOutput.description: Output for assigning an issue to a milestone

issue_number.description: Issue number to assign milestone to

AssignToAgentOutput.title: Assign to Agent Output
AssignToAgentOutput.description: Output for assigning a GitHub Copilot agent to an issue or project item

issue_number.description: Issue number to assign agent to

agent.description: Agent name or slug (defaults to 'copilot' if not provided)

NoOpOutput.title: No-Op Output
NoOpOutput.description: Output for logging a message without taking any GitHub actions. Always available as a fallback to ensure human-visible artifacts.
